activeModeText.message: Ativar limpeza automática? Atraso antes da limpeza:

cleanupDomainChangeText.message: Ativar limpeza na mudança de domínio

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.message: Ativar suporte para os separadores contentores do Firefox
contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Container Tabs

cookieCleanUpOnStartText.message: Limpar cookies de separadores abertos no arranque
cookieCleanUpOnStartText.description: Clean Cookies from Open Tabs on Startup

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: Executar limpeza agora, incluir cookies de separadores abertos
cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.description: Run cleanup now, include cookies from open tabs

disableAutoDeleteText.message: Alternar para desativar limpeza automática (modo manual)
disableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to disable automatic cleanup (manual mode)

enableAutoDeleteText.message: Alternar para ativar limpeza automática (modo automático)
enableAutoDeleteText.description: Toggle to enable automatic cleanup (automatic mode)

enableCleanupLogText.message: Ativar registo de limpeza e contador

enableNewVersionPopup.message: Ativar popup quando a nova versão é lançada
enableNewVersionPopup.description: Enable Popup when New Version is Released

extensionDescription.message: Controle os seus cookies! Apague automaticamente cookies não utilizados dos seus separadores fechados, enquanto mantém os que pretende.
extensionDescription.description: Control your cookies! Automatically delete unwanted cookies from your closed tabs while keeping the ones you want.

faqText.message: Perguntas frequentes, problemas e soluções comuns
faqText.description: Frequently Asked Questions, Common issues and solutions

greyCleanLocalstorage.message: Desmarcar 'Manter localstorage' em novas expressões da lista cinza
greyCleanLocalstorage.description: Uncheck 'Keep LocalStorage' on New Greylist Expressions

localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.message: Ativar a limpeza da localstorage e separadores contentores pode causar alguns efeitos secundários indesejados devido a limitações de API
localstorageAndContextualIdentitiesWarni.description: WARNING:  Enabling both LocalStorage Cleanup and Container Tabs may cause unwanted side effects due to API Limitations.  LocalStorage will be cleared by hostname on ALL containers.

localstorageCleanupWarning.message: Atenção: TODA a LocalStorage existente será removida após a ativação da Limpeza de LocalStorage.
localstorageCleanupWarning.description: Warning:  ALL existing LocalStorage will be cleared upon enabling of LocalStorage Cleanup.

menuText.description: Menu.  Only shown when the settings screen is small / when the hamburger icon shows / when the menu is collapsed.

noRulesText.message: Nenhuma regra corresponde a este domínio

notificationTitle.description: Cookies were deleted!  Used in Notification Title.

notifyCookieCleanUpText.message: Mostrar notificação após limpeza de cookies

oldReleasesText.message: As notas de lançamento mais antigas podem ser vistas online em
oldReleasesText.description: Older release notes can be viewed online at

questionExpression.message: Como é que as expressões funcionam?

reasonCleanCookieName.message: Limpeza parcial devido a $matchedExpression$ correspondente na $listType$
reasonCleanCookieName.description: Partial clean because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonCleanGreyList.message: Limpar por causa da limpeza de arranque e $matchedExpression$ está lista cinza
reasonCleanGreyList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and *.google.com is in the Greylist

reasonCleanNoList.message: Limpar porque $hostname$ não está nas listas branca/cinza
reasonCleanNoList.description: Clean because sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonCleanStartupNoList.message: Limpar por causa da limpeza de arranque e $hostname$ não está nas listas branca/cinza
reasonCleanStartupNoList.description: Clean because of startup cleanup and sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists

reasonKeep.message: Manter por causa de $matchedExpression$ correspondentes na $listType$
reasonKeep.description: Keep because of matched *.google.com in the Whitelist

reasonKeepOpenTab.message: Manter por causa de separadores abertos de *.$mainDomain$
reasonKeepOpenTab.description: Keep because of open tabs of *.google.com

reasonTabsWereIgnored.message: e também separadores abertos foram ignorados
reasonTabsWereIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists and also open tabs were ignored

reasonTabsWereNotIgnored.description: Clean because of sub.google.com is not in the White or Grey lists or in any open tabs

reviewLinkMessage.message: Obrigado por experimentar o $cadTitle$. Se gostou, então por favor deixe uma análise.
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a review.

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: Mostrar número de cookies para esse domínio
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain over the Icon

toGreyListText.message: Adicionar à lista cinza (limpar no reinício do navegador)
toGreyListText.description: Add to Greylist (Clean on Browser Restart)

toggleNotificationText.message: Alternar para ativar ou desativar notificações
toggleNotificationText.description: Toggle to enable or disable notifications

welcomeMessage.message: Olá! Durante esta sessão, o $cadTitle$ apagou $sessionDeleted$ cookies de um total de $totalDeleted$ cookies.
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.

whiteCleanLocalstorage.message: Desmarcar 'Manter localstorage' em novas expressões da lista branca
whiteCleanLocalstorage.description: Uncheck 'Keep LocalStorage' on New Whitelist Expressions
